SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwHeartOfLorkhanScript

SHORT SunderHit
SHORT KeeningHit
SHORT HeartMortal
SHORT DoOnce
SHORT Timer

BEGIN OnLoad
	mwHeartOfLorkhan.SetDestroyed 1
	mwHeartOfLorkhan.SetRestrained 1
	mwHeartOfLorkhan.MoveTo mwHeartOfLorkhanPosition
END

BEGIN OnActivate Player
	setrestrained 1
	Message "Lorkhan's heart beats fiercely. All you must do is strike it, and fufill your destiny."
END

BEGIN onHitwith 0sunder

	Set SunderHit TO (SunderHit+1)

END

BEGIN onHitwith 0keening

	Set KeeningHit TO (KeeningHit+1)

END


BEGIN GameMode

mwHeartOfLorkhan.MoveTo mwHeartOfLorkhanPosition
mwHeartOfLorkhan.SetScale 1.5

If HeartMortal==1
	Return



elseif (HeartMortal==0)&& (mwHeartOfLorkhan.GetAV Health<3000)
	mwHeartOfLorkhan.SetAV Health 4000

elseif (HeartMortal==1)
	mwHeartOfLorkhan.kill

elseIf (sunderhit==0) && (keeninghit>=1)
	;Hit with Keening without hitting with sunder
	Set sunderhit to 0
	Set keeninghit to 0
	moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup JumpStart 1
	Set DoOnce to 0
	Message "The Ritual has been disrupted, you must start again from the beginning."

elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==0) && (doonce==0)
	;Hit once with sunder
	
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechIndex to 10
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechLength to 5
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.MoveSpeaker to 1
	moXdagothur2. MoveTo Player
	moXdagothur2. StartCombat Player

	Set DoOnce to 1

elseif (sunderhit>1)
	;Hit more than once with Sunder
	Set sunderhit to 0
	Set keeninghit to 0
	moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup JumpStart 1
     Set DoOnce to 0
	Message "The Ritual has been disrupted, you must start again from the beginning."



elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==2) && (doonce==1)
	;Hit Once with Sunder andt twice with Keening
	

	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechIndex to 11
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechLength to 5
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.MoveSpeaker to 1	
	moXdagothur2. StartCombat Player

	Playsound 0hearthit1

	moXLorkhanREF.cast xhashxfireheart Player
	moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup Forward 1
		

Set DoOnce to 2
	

elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==4) && (DoOnce==2)
	; Hit Once with Sunder and 4 times with Keening
		
	moXLorkhanREF.cast xhashxfrostheart Player
	
	Playsound 0hearthit2
	
		moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup FastForward 1

	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechIndex to 12
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechLength to 5
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.MoveSpeaker to 1
	moXdagothur2. StartCombat Player
	Set DoOnce to 3

elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==5) && (DoOnce==3)

	;
	Playsound 0hearthit2
moXLorkhanREF.cast xhashxshockheart Player

	Playsound 0hearthit3

	moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup Right 1

	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechIndex to 13
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechLength to 5
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.MoveSpeaker to 1
	moXdagothur2. StartCombat Player
Set DoOnce to 4


elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==6) && (DoOnce==4)

	moXLorkhanREF.cast xhashxsMagicHeart Player

	Playsound 0hearthit4

		moXLorkhanShields. Playgroup Backward 1

Set DoOnce to 5


elseif (sunderhit==1) && (keeninghit==7) && (DoOnce==5)

	
	moXLorkhanREF.cast xhashxfireheart Player
	moXLorkhanREF.PlayGroup Forward 1

	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechIndex to 14
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.SpeechLength to 5
	Set moXqueXdagothtalkengine.MoveSpeaker to 1
	moXdagothur2. StartCombat Player
	Set DoOnce to 6
	Return

elseif DoOnce==6
	mwAkulakhanDreamer1.Disable
	mwAkulakhanDreamer2.Disable
	mwAkulakhanDreamer3.Disable

	StartQuest moXquestXEndEvents 
	Set HeartMortal to 1
	;SetStage fbmwMQ14 20  
	Set moXdagothur2.Dead to 1
     moXdagothur2.kill
	Set DoOnce to 7
endif
END
